title-group.article-title: A Method for Improving Strategic Decisions and Senior-level Teamwork in US National Security Organizations, Part 2

bio.p: Dr. Jim Thomason is the director of the Strategy and Risk Program at the Institute for Defense Analyses and is an assistant director in the Strategy, Forces and Resources Division. He has worked at IDA for 32 years.
Jim Bexfield is an adjunct research staff member at IDA and is a Past President, 1994 Wanner Award winner, and Fellow of MORS. He retired from OSD CAPE about five years ago.
